zone.line: hide now
I could not if I would mask myself here.
Come now, we'll go about from fire to fire —
pimp & lover
I'll be the pressman, you shall be the friar.
(to some old women, who are sitting round
a heap of glimmering coals)
Old Gentlewomen what do you out here
You ought to be with the young rioters
Right in the thickest of the revelry.—
But every one is best content at home.
General.
Who dare confide in right or a just claim?
So much as I had done for them, & now —
With women & the people 'tis the same
Youth will stand foremost ever - a Age may go
dark
To the cold grave unhonoured.
Minister
Nowadays
People assert thier rights: they go too far.
But as for me, the good old times I praise
